availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Sanford Faulconer (Harrison County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Melissa Jane Jones Faulconer on May 31, 1851. Father of George Faulconer, Elizabeth Faulconer, James Faulconer, and Ellen Faulconer. Stepfather of Mariah Faulconer, John Faulconer, Nathaniel Faulconer, and Melissa Faulconer. Farmer in Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1860. Farmer in Harrison County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 543.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 116A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Harrison County, KY, June and July 1863, p. 146.
James G. Faulconer, Thomas Faulconer and His Descendants, (Baltimore, MD: Gateway Press, Inc, 1984), 21, 150-53.
